eu.amidst.dynamic.exponentialfamily

Class EF_DynamicDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.dynamic.exponentialfamily.EF_DynamicDistribution
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EF_DynamicBayesianNetwork

    public abstract class EF_DynamicDistribution
extends Object
    This class defines a Exponential Family (EF) distribution in canonical form for Dynamic Bayesian networks.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected MomentParameters momentParameters
      Represents the vector of moment parameters.
      protected NaturalParameters naturalParameters
      Represents the vector of natural parameters.
      protected Variable var
      Represents the variable of the distribution.

        Returns:
        a MomentParameters object.

      • setNaturalParameters

        public void setNaturalParameters(NaturalParameters parameters)
        Sets the vector of natural parameters for this EF_DynamicDistribution. Note that this automatically and accordingly updates also the vector of moment parameters.
        Parameters:
        parameters - a given NaturalParameters object.

      • setMomentParameters

        public void setMomentParameters(SufficientStatistics parameters)
        Sets the vector of moment parameters for this EF_DynamicDistribution for given SufficientStatistics parameters. Note that this automatically and accordingly updates also the vector of natural parameters.
        Parameters:
        parameters - a given SufficientStatistics object.

      • setMomentParameters

        public void setMomentParameters(MomentParameters parameters)
        Sets the vector of moment parameters for this EF_DynamicDistribution for given MomentParameters. Note that this automatically and accordingly updates also the vector of natural parameters.
        Parameters:
        parameters - a given MomentParameters object.

        Updates the vector of natural parameters from the current vector of moment parameters.

        Updates the vector of moment parameters from the current vector of natural parameters.

        Returns:
        a SufficientStatistics object.

      • sizeOfSufficientStatistics

        public abstract int sizeOfSufficientStatistics()
        Returns the size of the sufficient statistics vector of this EF_DynamicDistribution.
        Returns:
        an int that represents the size of the sufficient statistics vector.

      • computeLogBaseMeasure

        public abstract double computeLogBaseMeasure(DynamicDataInstance dataInstance)
        Computes the logarithm of the base measure function for a given DynamicDataInstance.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a double that represents the logarithm of the base measure.

        Computes the log-normalizer function of this EF_Distribution.

      • computeLogProbabilityOf

        public double computeLogProbabilityOf(DynamicDataInstance dataInstance)
        Computes the log probability for a given DynamicDataInstance.
        Parameters:
        dataInstance - a DynamicDataInstance object.
        Returns:
        a double that represents the log probability value. TODO: the logbasemeasure and the lognormalizer are positives or negatives terms (Andres)
